author: The Irish Times
title: Coronavirus: UK cases rise to almost 50,000 as Pope begins holy week without public
description: Spain sees fall in confirmed new deaths as global cases reach more than 1.2 million
content:
Pope Francis has begun the first of several Holy Week ceremonies that will be held behind closed doors this year because of the coronavirus pandemic.
Normally, tens of thousands of Romans and pilgrims, clutching olive branches, would have flocked to an outdo… [+4864 chars]
